mapper.select: select A.BLTN_CONTENT_NO , A.BID_PJT_TCD , A.SUBJ , A.BLTN_CONTENT , A.SRCH_CNT , A.DEL_YN , A.INS_PERSON_ID , (SELECT X.USER_NM FROM tcom.tb_user_info X WHERE X.DEL_YN = 'N' AND X.USER_ID = A.INS_PERSON_ID) AS INS_PERSON_NM , A.INS_DATE , A.INS_TIME , A.UPD_PERSON_ID , A.UPD_DATE , A.UPD_TIME , A.LSP_GRP_CD , A.DW_MAIL_SEND_F FROM tebs.tb_bid_noti_info as A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BLTN_CONTENT_NO = #{bltn_content_no};
mapper.update: update tebs.tb_bid_noti_info set subj = #{subj}, bltn_content = #{bltn_content}, upd_date = #{upd_date}, upd_time = #{upd_time}, upd_person_id = #{upd_person_id}, lsp_grp_cd = (select p.lsp_grp_cd from ( select lsp_grp_cd from tebs.tb_lsp_pool_info where lsp_grp_nm = #{lsp_grp_nm} limit 1 ) p ) where bltn_content_no = #{bltn_content_no};
